text: Key takeaway today is not the second consecutive market schmeissing - rather it is the broad and dramatic decline in soft commodities and in the price of oil. That's more evidence of 'Peak Inflation.' @ScottWapnerCNBC @jimcramer @carlquintanilla @tomkeene @ferrotv @realmoney

This Summer I am in pursuit of the best Lobster Roll in Montauk, Long Island. Last night I went to Hooked hookedmtk.com/ really good, fresh meat, limited amount of mayo and a great roll. I give it a 9.5. Next Monday I am going to either The Gig Shack or Wave Crave.

@realmoney @seabreezelp @dougkass Jul 12, 2022 | 08:50 AM EDT DOUG KASS The Bull Case for Equities * The intermediate term upside reward vs downside risk has now turned more favorable after the brutal evisceration of stocks in 2022

* I expect a mild and brief recession, accompanied by a drop in inflation and a less hawkish Federal Reserve * Investors faced negative optionality of (non Gaussian) outcomes in the last half of 2021 * Today, arguably, investors face positive optionality and a more normal

distribution of outcomes... and less tail risks * In assessing the outlook for stocks, look forward and not backwards "When the time comes to buy, you won't want to." - Wally Deemer realmoney.thestreet.com/doug… @jimcramer @tomkeene @ferrotv @lisaabramowicz1 @carlquintanilla
